mdRecord.dcterms:title: Biography by S. N. Behrman
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Playbill for Biography by S. N. Behrman. Directed by John Going. Set by Bennet Averyt. Costumes by Sigrid Insull. Lighting by Michael Dalzell. 43rd Season.

Virginia
